ThingDef.Name: HJX_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona HJ-41 missile launcher
ThingDef.description: An individual anti-tank missile launcher, equipped with HJ-41 missile.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QLUX_Pulse_Projector_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QLUX Pulse Projector
ThingDef.description: Named after Zhu Rong, the god for its devastating power, QLU-X is a powerful pulse projector used by PLA in 2080s.Due to its high accuracy and long range of fire, QLU-X is able to easily suppress enemy battle positions, bunkers and slower targets. It must hold a bead on its target for several seconds while charging, before it releases a devastating tsunami of power. The explosion is capable of melting concrete in its blast radius. The heat of the explosion will ignite anything nearby. It cannot fire at close-up targets to prevent friendly fire.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: ISRL_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona individual swarm rocket launcher
ThingDef.description: An individual six-barrel rocket launcher, equipped with 40mm HE rockets.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PLP_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QSZL-79 pulse laser pistol
ThingDef.description: A prototype laser pistol, it can cause lethal damage to enemy at short range at high accuracy regardless of users' shooting skill, but it is unable to damage buildings.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona QBZL-801 pulse laser Rifle
ThingDef.description: A prototype laser rifle which can cause lethal damage to enemy at medium range at high accuracy regardless of users' shooting skill, but it is unable to damage buildings.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: QS_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBU-71 Viper
ThingDef.description: A multi-functional tactical sniper rifle that fires nanomechanical bullets, the nanomechanical elements in the bullets have two modes: they can paralyze the brain of humans or even mechanoids, or directly release a large amount of neurotoxins into the victim's blood stream.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. ThingDef.Name: QBZ_threeooE_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona QBZ-301E assault rifle
ThingDef.description: Developed in 2030s, QBZ301E(Export Type) is the first generation of charged assault rifle in the world. It is inaccurate and heavy due to limitation of battery technology.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W85XWJ_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona W85X WanJian
ThingDef.description: A smart LMG firing guide bullets, it can also switch mode to fire normal under emergency situations. Its mini fusion reactor can partially ionize metallic hydrogen ammo and launch them in the form of plasma. Its reactor may lead to a massive explosion if it takes damage.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
